projects.title: Voice-Based AI Assistant for Small Indian Retailers
projects.tagline: AI assistant for regional languages with OCR, object detection, and on-device LLM
projects.description: Developed an AI assistant for regional languages, integrating OCR, object detection, and on-device LLM to improve operational efficiency and reduce error rates for small Indian retailers.
awards: Nasscomm Foundation Thingqbator National Top 10 and Funded 5 Lakh INR by Nasscomm Foundation

projects.title: User-Friendly CRM for Real Estate Agents
projects.tagline: CRM with voice-driven operations and automatic product matching
projects.description: Engineered a comprehensive CRM system with voice-driven operations and automatic product matching, enhancing lead conversion and client satisfaction for real estate professionals.
awards: Udaan Business Plan Winner INR 25K Cash Prize
Nasscomm Foundation Thingqbator National Top 20  and Company Incorporation Funded

projects.title: DishDash: Fitness Fueler & Budget Buddy
projects.tagline: Personalized nutritional diet plans using linear programming optimization
projects.description: Developed an Android application that generates personalized nutritional diet plans using advanced linear programming. Implemented a backend with Google Apps Script and Google OR-Tools to solve constrained optimization models with nutritional constraints.

media.alt: DishDash nutrition optimization Google App script

projects.title: Serverless UPI Payment Confirmation System
projects.tagline: Real-time UPI payment verification with high throughput processing
projects.description: Developed a serverless system to confirm UPI payments, reducing processing time and operational cost. Leveraged asynchronous programming for high throughput and near real-time transaction verification.

projects.title: Post4Planet: Transforming Indian Postal Services
projects.tagline: Digital transformation initiative with sustainability focus and carbon tracking
projects.description: Led a digital transformation initiative for Indian Postal Services with a focus on sustainability. Implemented carbon emission tracking, resource optimization, and smart energy control via QR codes. Introduced eco-credits (Atoms) to reward sustainable practices.
awards: Smart India Hackathon 2024 Winner 1 Lakh INR Cash Prize

projects.title: Anu Civil - GeoExploratory Project Management System
projects.tagline: Integrated full-stack solution for construction project management
projects.description: Developed an integrated full-stack solution combining a Flutter mobile app and a Next.js web panel, improving project efficiency by 30%. Streamlined project management workflows for civil engineering projects.

projects.title: Harit Parishar - Sustainability Empowerment Application
projects.tagline: Personalized environmental insights with real-time ML analysis
projects.description: Developed an application to empower sustainability through personalized environmental insights. Leveraged ML Kit and TensorFlow to analyze sustainability metrics in real time, driving eco-friendly initiatives.

projects.title: Institute Gate Management (QR Code System)
projects.tagline: QR code-based access control with real-time authentication
projects.description: Designed and implemented a QR code-based access control system, integrating real-time authentication with Google Sheets and Django for streamlined institute gate management.

media.alt: Institute Gate Management QR Code System demo

projects.title: Referral System Demo for Business
projects.tagline: Comprehensive referral management with dual-interface system
projects.description: Developed a dual-interface referral system with an Associate Side for generating referral links (with OTP verification) and a comprehensive Admin Side for managing referrals and payments. Features secure bank details storage, dynamic dashboard updates, and QR code-based payment processing.

projects.title: Unified Workplace Data System
projects.tagline: Comprehensive workplace data aggregation with AI-powered analysis
projects.description: Developed a system to aggregate and contextualize workplace data from Linear, Slack, and Google Meet. Implemented webhooks to capture real-time updates, using Google Apps Script to format and centralize data in Google Docs. Integrated Chrome extension for meeting transcripts and Google Notebook LM for advanced analysis.

media.alt: Comprehensive Guide to Building a Workplace Contextualization System

projects.title: Smart CRM System in Google Sheets
projects.tagline: Advanced, No-Code/Low-Code CRM Prototype with Email Automation, Role-Based Views, and API Extensions
projects.description: Built a comprehensive lead management system entirely on Google Sheets, powered by Google Apps Script. Features centralized lead database, dynamic settings dashboard, automated email workflows, employee assignment system, analytics dashboard, and secure access management. Includes WhatsApp integration, Google Calendar scheduling, and API extension capabilities for scalable CRM automation.

media.alt: How I Turned Google Sheets into a Lean Automated CRM

projects.title: Gaze-Controlled Video Player (Blink-to-Pause)
projects.tagline: Hands-free media control using Python, OpenCV and a standard webcam
projects.description: Built a desktop video player prototype that automatically pauses when you look away and resumes when you look back. Implemented real-time face/eye detection, configurable delay thresholds, and simulated media-key control—no dedicated eye-tracker required.

media.alt: I Blinked ‑ And My Video Paused (Medium article)

projects.title: Universal Sensor-as-a-Service API
projects.tagline: Turn any smartphone into a real-time sensor gateway with an embedded HTTP REST server
projects.description: Developed a Flutter-powered micro-service that exposes phone sensors (accelerometer, gyroscope, GPS, camera and more) via a CORS-enabled HTTP/JSON API—transforming any idle phone into an instant IoT edge device.

projects.title: Retrieval-Augmented Assessment Recommender
projects.tagline: From web-scraping to LLM-reranking: a production-ready Gen-AI stack with FastAPI, Supabase & Gemini
projects.description: End-to-end system that ingests the SHL assessment catalog, embeds descriptions with Gemini, stores vectors in Postgres/pgvector, and serves real-time recommendations via a FastAPI RAG pipeline with a Streamlit UI.

projects.title: Telugu Word-Embedding Playground (CBOW Visualizer)
projects.tagline: Train, animate, and explore word embeddings for low-resource languages in a single desktop app
projects.description: End-to-end desktop application that lets users paste transliterated Telugu text, train a CBOW Word2Vec model, and watch real-time t-SNE/PCA visualisations with similarity & analogy tools — all powered by PyTorch, Tkinter, and Plotly.

projects.title: Telugu N-gram Model Visualizer
projects.tagline: Probability tables come alive: interactively explore 2-5 gram predictions with emoji-friendly Telugu text
projects.description: Desktop Tkinter tool that turns a pure-Python n-gram engine into an animated teaching aid—shows step-by-step math, bar-chart probabilities, and auto-saves screenshots/logs. Supports Telugu written in Latin script plus full emoji tokenisation.

projects.title: How We, the Science and Technical Council Team, Turned a Soda Bottle into a Sky-High Water Rocket
projects.tagline: Carbon-wrapped plastic bottle + air pressure = 100-meter DIY launch
projects.description: A weekend engineering project that transforms an ordinary soda bottle into a water-powered rocket using a hand-shaped nozzle, carbon-fiber reinforcement, and lightweight fins—demonstrating Newton's third law and reaching ~100 m altitude.

projects.title: Ultimate College Ranking Engine with NSGA-II Pareto Optimization
projects.tagline: Multi-criteria decision-making platform using advanced algorithms, real-time search, and interactive visualizations
projects.description: A sophisticated college ranking application that transforms simple CSV data into an intelligent decision-making platform. Built with Next.js 13 and FastAPI, it implements NSGA-II non-dominated sorting for Pareto optimization, allowing users to select multiple parameters and see optimal trade-offs rather than arbitrary single scores. Features include real-time parameter selection with instant re-ranking, persistent session history that remembers every comparison, advanced search and filtering with live results, interactive visualizations using Recharts and Material-UI, side-by-side college comparison with detailed breakdowns, and comprehensive error handling. The system processes 17 NIRF parameters across categories like Student Metrics, Faculty Quality, Research Output, and Diversity, providing transparency in ranking methodology while empowering users to prioritize what matters most for their educational decisions.

media.alt: Ultimate College Ranking Engine with NSGA-II Pareto Optimization
